Treat the injured man's leg again
Decipher
The criminal has been found, shall we start the arrest now?
【Fight to the Death】Arrest on Horseback
Couldn't find the\nwanted target\nwithin the time limit, seems like we have to let it go!
This Lin'an City is indeed a metropolis!
The city gate is huge!
The Government Office is huge!
The bust of the Maiden House girl is also huge!
Oh my!
The expenses are also huge!
Yes, I've recently taken some bounties from Lin'an City to make a living.
Hmm? I want to join too, where did you get it? Can you share it with your good brother?
Here, can't you see such a big sign?
But, if you don't have some skills, don't try to show off.
The difficulty of the bounties you accept varies. Act according to your own skills.
That's natural!
After all, you only have one life!
Hmm?
Bounty? Might as well go and take a look!
Start a fight on the horse<color=#c44b0e>(Directly initiate combat)</color>!
Come back later.
The person wanted on the bounty notice is right in front of you, do you want to subdue <color=#c44b0e>{PrisonerName}</color>?
Kid! You killed my disciples and dare to be arrogant in front of me, take this!
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, go talk to La Tazhang about joining us!
Master, we've been down the mountain for so long without any progress, but you don't seem to be in a hurry?
Ah, sometimes things have to happen in their own time, you can't force it~
That's not what you said when you left the mountain! You said you observed the stars at night and sensed that we might meet someone destined in Daliang City.

You even solemnly told the headmaster that this destined person is the key to the future of our Taoist Sect, so you specifically came down the mountain to enlighten this person to join the Taoist Sect...
You blockhead! If I didn't say that, would the headmaster let me down the mountain?
Ah! Did you just make it up?
Watch your words! When have I ever spoken nonsense? Those were just drunken words, just drunken words.
However, if we return to the mountain without accomplishing anything, it will be troublesome to find an excuse to come down the mountain in the future...
I didn't expect to meet the two Taoist priests here, what a pleasant surprise.
La Tazhang Chang Chunzi looks at the protagonist
La Tazhang looks at the protagonist from all sides
It's like finding something without even looking for it!
Master, could it be...\n{PlayerSurName} Young hero, are you the destined person?
Yes, yes!
Master, could it be...\n{PlayerSurName} Young hero, are you the destined person?
This kid is intelligent, he will definitely carry forward the martial arts of the Taoist Sect!
But his character may not be the best choice.
Just because he invited me for a drink, his character can't be too bad. If one day he really commits a heinous crime, I will personally take action to eliminate him!
{PlayerSurName} Kid, have you heard of our Taoist Sect?
What a pity, what a pity...
Indeed a pity...
What are you two pitying?

{PlayerSurName} Kid, I originally thought I would have a relationship with you as fellow disciples. But your character is average, and your intelligence is also average, you really can't enter my eyes.
Do you have to be so direct?
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, our Taoist Sect always selects disciples based on both character and intelligence.
Although the young hero has helped out a few times, but when it comes to the inheritance of the sect... Even if it's my master, I can't break the rules to accept you.
Hehe, luckily I didn't actively seek a master.\nIf I had sought a master and then been rejected, where would my face be?
{PlayerSurName}Kid, we'll have the chance to meet again in the future, let's part ways for today.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, I'll take my leave.
{PlayerSurName} Kid, have you heard of our Taoist Sect?
I haven't heard of it.
I've heard of it.

The Taoist Sect was established hundreds of years ago, and is now one of the <color=#c44b0e>three religions</color> in the world.\nHowever, neither my senior brother nor I care much about this fake fame.

After my senior brother became the head of the sect, he has always taken saving the world as his purpose, and the disciples under his command are required to be outstanding in <color=#c44b0e>benevolence and righteousness</color>. If a disciple does something unkind or unjust, they will be punished lightly by facing the wall in meditation, or severely by being expelled from the sect after their martial arts are abolished.
Our sect is good at <color=#c44b0e>fist and sword techniques</color> in external skills, and our internal skills lean towards defense, emphasizing readiness!
My senior brother also has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>Taichi Thirteen Forms</color>, which is said to be able to block hundreds of attacks with one, and win with fewer against many.
I am the junior brother of the head of the sect, Zhong Yangzi...

I don't know anything about observing qi and physiognomy, and I've never heard of drawing talismans to exorcise spirits.\nAs for martial arts, if I learn for a few more years, it won't be a problem for me to become the tenth best martial artist in the world.

<color=#c44b0e>Bandit Camp</color>, a group of lawless bandits gathered together, often looting villages and passers-by in the Nameless area.
<color=#c44b0e>Blue Wind Camp</color>, under the guise of robbing the rich to help the poor, they defy the laws of the court and openly kidnap and extort in Chuxiang City, they are truly lawless!

Langya Sword Pavilion was founded by me thirty years ago. It was originally a place to store my collection of divine weapons, Sharp. Now, its reputation in the martial arts world is only slightly inferior to the "Three Teachings" of Confucianism, Buddhism, and Taoism.

Nowadays, three or four out of ten divine weapons, Sharp, that appear in the martial arts world are from the Sword Pavilion. Therefore, as long as the disciples of the Sword Pavilion do not make Nemesis when they go out into the martial arts world, other sects will mostly give some face to the disciples of the Sword Pavilion.

I accept disciples widely, not only teaching swordsmanship, but also the method of forging divine weapons, Sharp. The mine in the back mountain of our sect is rich in resources, inexhaustible and inexhaustible, which is convenient for our disciples to practice forging.

The two main disciples under my sect are both rare swordsmanship geniuses, but they have different styles. One is ethereal and elegant, and the other is simple and thick. All disciples of the Sword Pavilion can Request swordsmanship from them.

There is also a unique skill in the Langya Sword Pavilion, known as <color=#c44b0e>Ten Thousand Swords</color>! It is a killing move that I realized in my old age, using Qi to control the sword. Once this move is used, it can kill both gods and Buddhas.
From today, {PlayerName} is a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion!

{PlayerName}, you're awake. How are your injuries?
Reporting to the Sect Leader, it's no longer a problem.
The poison you were poisoned with, I have used MP to force it out of your body, no hidden dangers will be left.
Thank you, Sect Leader!
The old Taoist can't protect you for a lifetime. In the future, your generation will need to shield the Taoist Sect from wind and rain. So, {PlayerName}, you need to work hard.
The Successor of the Three Sects
Successor
Invite Lai Toudian and Cai Youzhi to the Buddha Temple to challenge the demon.
Go back and report the situation to Zhong Yangzi.
{PlayerName}, have you ever heard of the story of the Successor of the Three Sects?
I haven't heard of it.
There is a hidden story in it, and it's time for you to know.
Decades ago, the masters of the three sects came out in full force and jointly attacked a demon. For some reasons, they couldn't kill him and could only trap him.
In the end, the three sects and the demon made a bet, which made him give up resistance and willingly be imprisoned.
What kind of bet could make the demon willingly be captured?

The three sects had to select the most outstanding disciples of the past decade to represent the Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, and Confucius Temple, as the successors of the three sects, to challenge the demon together.

If they can defeat the demon with half of his strength, the demon promises to willingly be imprisoned for another ten years. If they fail, he will break out of prison and reappear in the martial arts world!
At that time, the demon was already invincible in the world. If he reappears in the martial arts world, he will inevitably stir up a bloody storm again, and no one will be able to compete with him.
{PlayerName}, you are extraordinary and talented. You can represent the Taoist Sect and join the other two sects to complete this great task of suppressing the demon!
Who are the successors of the Shifa Temple and Confucius Temple? And where can we find this demon?
The successor of the Shifa Temple is <color=#c44b0e>Lai Toudian</color>, and the successor of the Confucius Temple is <color=#c44b0e>Cai Youzhi</color>.
The demon is now trapped in the <color=#c44b0e>Tongtian Tower in the Buddha Temple</color>. Don't provoke him unless you are absolutely sure.
{PlayerName}, this matter concerns the lives of all people in the world, so don't act rashly.
I will follow the Master's teachings!
Master, the great demon Chu Kuangsheng was accidentally killed in the chaos. I can't escape the blame, please punish me.
How is that possible... Did he say anything before he died?
No, he didn't leave any words.
Alas, it's fate.
{PlayerName}, you have made contributions in suppressing the demon. Here are your rewards.
This great demon is powerful, do not engage him without full confidence, lest he escapes in the midst of chaos.
The martial world can be peaceful for another ten years...
{PlayerName}, you have made a great contribution to this demon suppression, I am quite pleased, these are your rewards.
Ah! This, this, this is bad...\nThe martial world may be plunged into chaos again...
{PlayerName}, have you ever heard of the story of the Successor of the Three Sects?
I haven't heard of it.
There is a hidden story in it, and it's time for you to know.
Decades ago, the masters of the three sects came out in full force and jointly attacked a demon. For some reasons, they couldn't kill him and could only trap him.
In the end, the three sects and the demon made a bet, which made him give up resistance and willingly be imprisoned.
What kind of bet could make the demon willingly be captured?

The three sects had to select the most outstanding disciples of the past decade to represent the Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, and Confucius Temple, as the successors of the three sects, to challenge the demon together.

If they can defeat the demon with half of his strength, the demon promises to willingly be imprisoned for another ten years. If they fail, he will break out of prison and reappear in the martial arts world!
At that time, the demon was already invincible in the world. If he reappears in the martial arts world, he will inevitably stir up a bloody storm again, and no one will be able to compete with him.
{PlayerName}, you are extraordinary and talented. You can represent the Taoist Sect and join the other two sects to complete this great task of suppressing the demon!
The head of the sect need not worry.
Some time ago, when I was traveling down the mountain, I happened to repel a strange man who called himself "Chu Kuangsheng".
How is that possible...\nDid he say anything before he left?
No, he didn't leave any words.
Alas, it's fate.
{PlayerName}, your unintentional act has saved the entire martial world from a great disaster, these are your rewards.
Finally, a fish has taken the bait, it's worth waiting here for so long...
Why are they all small fish and shrimps? It really disappoints me.
Tong, who are you calling small fish and shrimp!
Oh, I thought it was someone else? You little guy is still alive?\nToday is just right, I can settle this matter.
Who is the small fish and shrimp is still unknown, perhaps you are not even as good as a fish worm!

You don't even recognize me, you are indeed a newborn calf who is not afraid of tigers.\nLet me tell you, so you won't be a confused ghost in the underworld, I am Tong Daofu from the Imperial City Division!
Oh, isn't this the famous hero {PlayerSurName}?\nI didn't expect that I would catch you while fishing, what a pleasant surprise.
Tong, so it was you who set up the trap, trying to catch all the martial artists who came for the treasure with your so-called treasure?
Oh, I don't have such a big appetite as you said.\nIt's just that catching you, this big fat fish, is a blessing from heaven.
Who are you?\nAre you the one setting up the trap, planning to catch all the martial artists who come for the treasure with your so-called treasure?
I am Tong Daofu from the Imperial City Division.\nI don't have such a big appetite, having you, this big fat fish, is enough for me.
Why so much nonsense, if you want to fight, just do it.
Oh, don't get so angry, you're young and you're not afraid of ruining your health.\nDo you think I'm easy to bully because I'm alone?
You set up the trap on purpose, naturally you won't take risks easily, I suppose you have already surrounded this place.
Hehehe, it's a rare blessing for a smart little guy like you to die in my hands.
Now, who is the butcher and who is the meat?
Hehehehe——
Kid, you're still too green.\nI am the commander of the Imperial City Division, how could I have only this trick.
Do you have any other tricks?
{yell}, all of you go to hell!
That was close, I didn't expect this guy to have such strength left.
With one less schemer like this in the martial world, there will be more peace.
You all, in front of my Fu Bu Bingwei, are nothing but ants!
What is this guy doing here again?
The barbarians of the small island, trying to get their hands on the treasures of the Central Plains, are simply overestimating themselves.
Although the martial arts of the Central Plains are not united, it's not your turn to stir up trouble.
You rats of Dragonfly City, my Langya Sword Pavilion is at odds with you!
Hahaha, hypocrite!\nIf you have the guts, join forces and bring me down first.
(Do you want to intervene?)
Join the siege of Fu Bu Bingwei. <color=#c44b0e>(Specific battle)</color>
Just watch the changes.
The rats of Dragonfly City are nothing more than that!
Has the Central Plains martial arts opened your eyes?
Don't be arrogant, wait for me to come back another day!
You, are you not afraid of death?
You're just a defeated general, what right do you have to be so arrogant.
You know nothing about me!
You can remain unscathed even when besieged by disciples of several major sects, I'm not sure I can handle you.
You're frank enough, but I don't plan to let you live to run away.
In that case, shut up and make your move!
I wonder if this battle counts as eliminating a major hidden danger for the future.
If all the martial arts in the Central Plains are as cowardly as you, I don't need to worry!
Hmph! You're not worthy to fight with me!
Mediation
Do you need Linlang Temple to mediate for you, young friend?
Need mediation.
Not for now.
It's better to resolve disputes than to create them, young friend, you should be forgiving when you can.
This chess game is broken, there's nothing to see.
The layout of this chess game seems a bit peculiar, do you want to play a game?
Touch the chessboard and chess pieces. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
Do nothing.
It turns out that cracking this chess game will reward a manual, this is unexpected.\nI'd better keep it safe, so as not to benefit others.
With my current strength, I can't crack this chess game yet, I'll come back later.
This chess game is so profound?
I feel dizzy!
Wolf Trouble in Xiangfan
Help the bailiff of Chuxiang City collect 10 Wolf fangs.
Go to the notice board to find the bailiff of Chuxiang City.
Young hero, wait a moment!
I see that you are brave and extraordinary, you must be a martial artist.\nDid you just make a move to take on this task from the notice board?
I'll check the difficulty of the task first, then decide whether to take it.
Please do me a favor, young hero, there will be a reward upon completion.
What do you want me to do for you?
There is a valley outside Chuxiang City, called Wild Wolf Valley!\nIt's full of wolves, and all the people who come and go avoid it.
I would like to ask you to go to Wild Wolf Valley to clear out these wild wolves and bring back <color=#c44b0e>10 Wolf fangs</color> as proof.
Such a dangerous place, you don't go yourself but ask me to go to die, what's your intention?
Under heavy reward, there must be a brave man. If you can help me with this, I will give you a <color=#c44b0e>treasure that generates money every day</color>!
I've got 10 Wolf fangs, I wonder if the bailiff in the city is still waiting for me.
There are many wild wolves in Wild Wolf Valley, don't go too deep, be careful not to get flanked and can't get out.
How's the collection of 10 Wolf fangs going?
I've collected them all. <color=#097a76>(10 Wolf fangs)</color>
Not yet, you wait a little longer.
Young hero, you are indeed reliable. I didn't wait for you in vain.\nHere is the treasure I promised you. Keep it safe.
Why would you want to exchange this treasure for a few Wolf fangs with me?

This Three-legged golden toad may seem like a treasure, but it's actually quite useless. It's better to exchange it for some practical benefits. These Wolf fangs are my achievements and proof of my bravery in killing wolves. They will be useful for my promotion in the future!
I need to hand in these Wolf fangs as soon as possible, so no one else can get to them first.
Brother, do you know why I brought you to Lin'an City?
Isn't it to show me the prosperity of Lin'an City?
No, no!\nI've heard rumors from my brothers in the martial arts world that there's a rare treasure hidden in Lin'an City!
Are you here to hunt for treasure?
Since it's a treasure, many people must be coveting it. Let's just watch the excitement.
Being able to see a rare treasure with my own eyes is indeed worth the trip.
It is said that the treasure is hidden at the top of the <color=#097a76>Enlighten Tower</color>. Let's go and see the excitement.
It's really a bad year. We've been robbed by bandits time and time again. This Government Office is just like a decoration.
Could it be the thieves from the Horse King Cave outside the city?
Who else could it be!
The government's reward notice has been posted for many years. Many heroes have gone and never returned, and they have become even more rampant!
I hope there will be a highly skilled hero who can eliminate this trouble for us.
Alas, I hope so...
Jianghu Master
Head to the Ritual Platform to prepare to take over as Jianghu Master.
Head to Ritual Platform, prepare to be re-elected as Jianghu Master.

"The Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Water Camp, and Crime Investigation Bureau jointly recommend {PlayerName} to take over the position of Jianghu Master that has been vacant for many years..."

"The <#c44b0e>Ritual Platform</color> is where the various sects of the martial arts world elect the Jianghu Master. Please go to the Ritual Platform to participate in the Jianghu Master succession ceremony!"

Choosing to hold the Jianghu Master succession ceremony here is really ambitious!\nI need to be fully prepared to participate in this succession ceremony, so as not to fail their test and be laughed at.
Join the Jianghu Master ceremony! (Companion leaves the team)
Not ready yet.
The foreign enemy Yan Kingdom's Agile invasion, the various forces of the court each holding their own territory, the constant strife among the martial arts sects...
In such a chaotic time, we need a person who is the hope of everyone, to turn the tide and support the collapsing building.
{PlayerName}, you are a rare young hero in recent decades, and now you are highly respected by all major sects. You are the person everyone is hoping for!
According to the rules of the past, anyone who is elected as Jianghu Master must defeat all the sect leaders present one by one to gain final recognition.
In that case, I ask the sect leaders to teach me!
Which sect leader will teach me first?
{PlayerName}, I, Luo Tianxiong from the Crime Investigation Bureau, will learn from you!
Master Luo, please!
I admit defeat, as I am not as skilled as you.
I will compete with you in this round.\nJiujiang Water Camp·Ding Fengbo, please teach me!
Master Ding, please!
Young hero, you are superior in skills. I admire you!
I will accompany you in this battle.\nConfucius Temple·Cai Yuanchang, please make your move, young hero.
Master Cai, please!
Indeed, the student surpasses the master.
Langya Sword Pavilion·Jian Chi, please make your move, young hero!
Senior, please enlighten me!
A hero in his youth, this old man can't keep up anymore.
Amitabha, let this old monk make the move in this round. \nShifa Temple·Hui Yuan, please make your move, benefactor.
Master Hui Yuan, please!
Well, well.
This is the final battle. If you can defeat the long sword in the hands of the old Taoist, you will truly be a Jianghu Master.
Taoist Sect·Zhong Yangzi, please make your move, young hero!
Head of the sect, please!
Boundless Heavenly Lord!
{PlayerName} is universally acknowledged, and his martial arts skills are unparalleled. The old Taoist announces: {PlayerName} is the new Jianghu Master!
Congratulations to the leader {PlayerSurName}!
Now I have become the universally honored Jianghu Master, what should I do next?
Achieve the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master</color> ending (Game Over).
Continue to travel in Jianghu.

I am honored to be elevated to the position of Jianghu Master by all the seniors.\nFrom now on, I, {PlayerName}, will live up to everyone's trust, and will do my utmost to settle the chaos in Jianghu and resist the invasion of evil cults in the Central Plains Jianghu.
This grand event is a rare opportunity, don't take it lightly! \nWe will temporarily run away from the team, and you can find us at the old place after the event.
"Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Water Camp, Crime Investigation Bureau jointly recommend {PlayerName} for re-election as Jianghu Master..."
"<#FFC0CB>Ritual Platform</color> is the place where all factions of Jianghu elect the Jianghu Master, you can go to Ritual Platform to participate in the ceremony!"
Revisit the old place, full of emotions.\nI need to be fully prepared to participate in this re-election ceremony, so as not to fail their test and be laughed at.
{PlayerName}, you were the last Jianghu Master, you should be clear about the rules, the old Taoist will not say more.
The leaders of each faction, please come forward and teach.

I am honored to be re-elected as Jianghu Master by the elders.\nFrom now on, I, {PlayerName}, will continue to do my best to stabilize the chaos in Jianghu and resist the invasion of evil cults in Central Plains Jianghu.
You, {PlayerName}, become the new Jianghu Master decades later.
At this moment, you are full of spirit, and when you call from a high place, responders gather.
Behind the glory, you will bear more responsibilities.
From now on, you will lead the heroes to rectify the chaotic world.
Hmm?
That was quick!
When I, the Crime Investigation Bureau, handle cases, there is never a time when I fail!
column3: เมื่อข้าสำนักสืบสวนออกโรงรับคดี ไม่เคยมีครั้งไหนเลยที่จะล้มเหลว!

column2: Huh?
The famous head of the Crime Investigation Bureau is nothing more than a paper tiger after all!
column3: ถึงแม้จะเป็นหัวหน้าสำนักสืบสวนอันโด่งดัง แต่แท้จริงแล้วก็เป็นเพียงเสือกระดาษเท่านั้น!

column2: Washing Silk!
Wandering Dragon!
Wind Stab!
Wind Breaker!
That was close!
Eh!? Just at this time...
column3: อึก!? ทำไมต้องเป็นตอนนี้...

column2: Hmm? An opportunity!
column3: หื้มม? เสร็จข้าล่ะ!

column2: I need to be faster!
There's no way out!
Please return, our sect is not currently accepting disciples from the secular world.
Our school is not currently looking to take on new disciples.
Our stronghold is not currently looking to take on new disciples.
Our sect is not currently looking to take on new disciples.
The escort agency is not currently short of hands.
Providing timely help

The Refugee Camp outside the city is short of food, and people have died from hunger. All disciples of our mountain stronghold must quickly enter the city to purchase food and deliver it to the Refugee Camp to solve the urgent need.
Food
Go into the city and purchase 5 portions of Rice and 5 portions of Wheat flour.
Deliver the food to the Refugee Camp.
Return to the Blue Wind Camp notice board to complete the task.
These supplies should be just enough for the Refugee Camp to get by for now, I should hurry and deliver them.
I heard that you are in urgent need of food, we from the Blue Wind Camp have brought you these supplies, we hope they can help.
Please convey my thanks to the leader, the kindness of the Blue Wind Camp will never be forgotten by everyone at the Refugee Camp.
I can't accept your generous gift.\nYou should hurry and take care of the refugees, I hope no more people will starve to death.
Although the food is still insufficient, at least there is a glimmer of hope, it should be able to last a few more days.
The food in the camp has all been eaten, and it has reached the point of eating grass roots and tree bark. I don't know how long the people here can live.
Sigh...
You left the food on your body at the Refugee Camp,\nAlthough the quantity is not much, it may bring a glimmer of hope to the people who are still alive.
Robbing the rich to help the poor
A caravan passed by nearby, and the bodyguards hired by the caravan were weak and vulnerable. Interested brothers can go and check it out.
Go to investigate the caravan near the mountain stronghold.
Which hero are you, why are you stopping us here?
I opened this mountain and planted this tree. If you want to pass, leave the road money!
Where are the bandits in this peaceful and prosperous age, don't scare people here.\nI won't give you a penny!
Then I'm sorry.
No wonder they are so stingy, there is indeed not much oil and water on these people.\nAnyway, this task is considered complete.
Robbing the rich to help the poor
A caravan passed by nearby, and the bodyguards hired by the caravan were highly skilled and numerous. Brothers who are confident in their own skills can go and check it out.
Go to investigate the caravan near the mountain stronghold.
Which hero are you, why are you stopping us here?
I opened this mountain and planted this tree. If you want to pass, leave the road money!
Where are the bandits in this peaceful and prosperous age, don't scare people here.\nI won't give you a penny!
Then I'm sorry.
No wonder they hired so many powerful bodyguards, this rich businessman is really oily.\nAnyway, this task is considered complete.
Acting for the heavens

A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
Kill the corrupt official passing by near the mountain stronghold.
When the adults are out, all idlers get out of the way!
I'm not an idler, I'm here for Suo Ming.
You lowly people dare to intimidate the official!\nCome here, kill him, and take his head as the official's achievement in protecting the territory and the people.
Sure enough, it's a brutal and shameless dog official, come and get your life!
The life of this dog official should not be worth the many lives he has persecuted.\nIt's too cheap for him to die so happily.
Acting for the heavens

A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several martial arts superb officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
Kill the corrupt official passing by near the mountain stronghold.
When the adults are out, all idlers get out of the way quickly!
I am here for Suo Ming, who was wronged and died in the hands of this dog official!

Huh, there are hundreds of lowly people like you who have died in the hands of the official.\nThe official was originally worried about being blamed by the superior for not being strong enough to suppress the bandits, and it just so happened to make up the number with you.
Sure enough, it's a brutal and shameless dog official, come and get your life!
The life of this dog official should not be worth the many lives he has persecuted.\nIt's too cheap for him to die so happily.
Rescue from the prison
A brother from the mountain stronghold was accidentally captured by the Official and is now detained in the Chuxiang City Government Office Prison. Brothers, hurry up and rescue!
Go to Chuxiang City Government Office Prison to rescue the brother from the mountain stronghold.
Brother, you have suffered, I will rescue you.
It's too dangerous here, {PlayerSurName} brother, why are you here?\nYou go quickly, don't worry about me, we can't all fall here!
This place can't stay for long, let me take you back to the mountain stronghold.
Thank you {PlayerSurName} brother for risking your life to save me.\nI have a family heirloom here, and I will give it to my brother today.
Sure enough, there are accomplices! Capture them all, and then these two thieves will be beheaded together.
It's a pity that I couldn't save this brother, this mission is considered a failure.
That was too dangerous just now, I almost lost my life.\nAlas, I failed to rescue the brother from the prison, this mission is considered a failure.
Old illness

The leader suffered multiple internal injuries from fights in his early years and has not yet healed. Brothers, please pay attention to doctors who are skilled in medicine, and invite them to the stronghold to heal the leader, there will be great rewards!
Find a doctor with at least 100 in medicine.
Heal
Leader, I heard that you have not yet healed from your internal injuries.\nI consider myself to have some skills in medicine, so I came to heal you.
You?\nI've never heard that you have this medical skill.
You will know if I have such skills after a try, leader.
Alright, just do it, it can't be worse than it is now.
After one shichen...
{PlayerSurName}, you are not simple!\nYou are the most skilled doctor I have ever seen, you really cured my internal injuries!
Congratulations to the leader for getting rid of the disease and improving your strength.
Leader, I heard that you have not yet healed from your internal injuries.\nI found a skilled doctor to heal you.
{PlayerSurName}, you are thoughtful.\nBut I have been diagnosed by countless doctors, all of them are helpless, I have long given up hope.
Hmph, does the leader not believe in my medical skills?
My friend's medical skills are almost miraculous, leader, why not give it a try.
Alright, just do it, it can't be worse than it is now.
After one shichen...
It's really amazing, a miraculous regeneration!\nThe chronic disease of many years has really been cured, I feel full of strength!
Don't compliment me, I did this for {PlayerName}.
Hahaha, {PlayerSurName}, you helped me solve a big problem.
Congratulations to the leader for getting rid of the disease and improving your strength.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples of the Sword Pavilion need to go down the mountain for experience after they have learned, and spar with people in the rivers and lakes to hone their martial arts. The person to spar with this time is Luo Qianxue from the Crime Investigation Bureau.
Find Luo Qianxue from the Crime Investigation Bureau to spar.
Spar
So it's the young hero {PlayerSurName} from Langya Sword Pavilion.\nSo you want to spar with me, then please advise!
Miss Qianxue, please.
Young hero {PlayerSurName} is indeed a high disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion, I admire.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please.
The persistent spirit of young hero {PlayerSurName} is really admirable.\nI will follow your lead.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples of the Sword Pavilion need to go down the mountain for experience after they have learned, and spar with people in the rivers and lakes to hone their martial arts. The person to spar with this time is Hua Qingqing from the Nest of Swallow.
Find Hua Qingqing from the Nest of Swallow to spar.
Spar
It's {PlayerName} from Langya Sword Pavilion.\nIf you want to spar with me, I won't be merciful, you better be prepared.
Miss Hua, please.
Hmph, it's just a fluke to win by a fluke, it's nothing great.
As expected, you are not a match, you should go and practice more.
You still want to fight? I'm really impressed by you.\nSince you want to continue, I'll accompany you to the end.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is Kong Yidao from the Blue Wind Camp.
Find Kong Yidao from the Blue Wind Camp to compete in martial arts.
Spar
It's a good opportunity for me to see the exquisite martial arts of the Langya Sword Pavilion!
I appreciate your kindness, leader.
Hahaha, it's refreshing, the disciples of the Langya Sword Pavilion are indeed well-deserved.
What a disappointment, it's not satisfying at all.\nYou don't seem to have learned the exquisite swordsmanship of the Langya Sword Pavilion, there's really no challenge.
Good boy, you're persistent!\nI'll accompany you to the end today, I want to see how long you can hold on.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is Han Hongyu from the Tiger Escort.
Find Han Hongyu from the Tiger Escort to compete in martial arts.
Spar
I've heard a lot about the exquisite swordsmanship of the Langya Sword Pavilion, today is a good opportunity to learn.
I appreciate your kindness, head escort.
Today I really opened my eyes, the disciples trained by the Langya Sword Pavilion are indeed well-deserved.
Are you really a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion? How can you be so incompetent?
If you have confidence to defeat me, then come on, don't let me look down on the Langya Sword Pavilion.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is Jiang Nanguai from Chuxiang CityDirty Street.
Find Jiang Nanguai from Chuxiang City to compete in martial arts.
Spar
So you're here to compete in martial arts, you really think highly of the old monster.\nThe old monster is itching for a fight today, why not accompany you to play a few moves to warm up.
I appreciate your kindness, senior.
It's really hard to resist aging, the future belongs to you young people.
Kid, you seem a bit weak, you need to go back and replenish your strength.
Your unyielding character really reminds me of the old monster when he was young.\nSince you insist so much, the old monster will reluctantly accompany you to play for a while.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is Cai Youzhi from the Confucius Temple.
Find Cai Youzhi from the Confucius Temple to compete in martial arts.
Spar
I've always been curious about what makes the martial arts of the Langya Sword Pavilion dominate the rivers and lakes.\nToday is a good opportunity to open my eyes!
I appreciate your kindness, Brother Cai.
The martial arts of the Langya Sword Pavilion are indeed exquisite, I am convinced.
Is the rumor wrong? The disciples of the Langya Sword Pavilion should not be so vulnerable.
Good, not arrogant in victory or discouraged in defeat.\nWith your perseverance, you are worthy of being a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion's Jian Chi.
Spar

According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect.
Find La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect to compete in martial arts, finding him is not an easy task.
Spar
Kid, I don't care who you are a disciple of, don't expect me to show mercy.
I appreciate your kindness, senior.
I didn't expect you to be so capable.\nThe martial arts of Langya Sword Pavilion are so powerful, it's really eye-opening.
What a disappointment, I thought the disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion would be more capable.
I'll give you another chance to compete with me, considering your stubbornness!
Surrender Hei Yuan
Hei Yuan at the end of the back mountain of the Sword Pavilion is hindering our disciples from mining, we need to solve this problem as soon as possible, our reserves are already running low.
Solve the problem caused by Hei Yuan on the back mountain of the Sword Pavilion.
{yell} Roar! Roar!!!
This guy is really not friendly at all, no wonder many senior brothers have suffered from him.
This big guy is a living creature after all, how should we deal with it?
Communicate with it in beast language.<color=#097a76>(Beast Taming Level 4 Expert)</color>

Let me teach you a fun game. If you learn it, you can keep me company in my spare time.
The two of us will simultaneously make a gesture in each round, either "rock", "scissors", or "paper". Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, paper beats rock.

Three Sects Demon Suppression
Demon Suppression
Go to {Shifa Temple}, {Confucius Temple}, find {Hui Yuan} and {Cai Yuanchang}, invite the heirs of the two sects to gather at {Taoist Sect}.
{Shifa Temple}, {Confucius Temple} have agreed to the invitation, now return to {Taoist Sect} to report to {Zhong Yangzi}.
More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.

This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
The heads of the three sects joined forces, laid out several plans, went through many twists and turns, and paid a heavy price to capture him severely injured.

This man not only knows the long-lost sect manuals of the three sects, but also is the only person in the world who knows the whereabouts of the {Imperial Seal}, so he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, not killed.
Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.

There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.

During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?

Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
Risks and opportunities coexist...

{PlayerName}, the old Taoist wants you to represent the Taoist Sect, to invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition, to determine who will be the guardian this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your personal fate.
Yes, I will definitely bring honor to the Taoist Sect and let the world know that the Taoist Sect always stands at the top of the three sects!
I already know why you are here, but in the past, the Taoist Sect always sent La Tazhang, but today you are sent here. How capable can you, a young boy, be to take on this task?

If you can take this move from the old man, the Confucius Temple will naturally send someone to the Taoist Sect; otherwise, please ask the Taoist Sect to choose another successor, and don't treat the demon suppression as a child's play!
You, as a senior leader of a sect, taking action against a junior, isn't that demeaning yourself?
This is not a child's play, how can such a weak person guard the demon head, go back and tell the head of Chongyang to change someone else.
Young man, do you really want to be so stubborn? The old man wants to see how many times you will fall before you give up!
You barely have some skills, since you have passed the old man's test, the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment.

I didn't expect that the head of Chongyang would send you to participate in the competition of the successors of the three sects this time. It must be that he is fully confident. In consideration of the past, the old man will not make things difficult for you. Go back and tell the head of Chongyang that the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment on time.
Please tell the head of the sect that the Shifa Temple will send the successor to attend the appointment on time.
So easy? It's a bit unexpected.\nDon't you want to test whether I am qualified to represent the Taoist Sect?

The old monk believes that the head of the sect will not treat the demon suppression as a child's play. If you are sent here, there must be his reason, and the old monk does not need to worry about it.
{PlayerGivenName} junior brother, I have been waiting here on behalf of the Confucius Temple.
{PlayerSurName} brother, I have been waiting here for a long time.
I am Cai Youzhi, representing the Confucius Temple, and I have been waiting here for a long time.
{PlayerSurName} senior brother, the little monk is here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
You are really slow, poor monk has been waiting for you for half a day.
You are polite, poor monk Lai Toudian, here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin.\n{PlayerName} You are new to the sect and don't understand the rules, let the old Taoist explain it to you.

{PlayerName} You represent the Taoist Sect in the battle, you are the host of this time, you need to go through three competitions, the first one is you and the successor of the Shifa Temple against the Confucius Temple; the second one is you and the Confucius Temple against the Shifa Temple; the third one is you alone against the two sects.

If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon head this year; if you lose any round in the middle, this matter will have nothing to do with our Taoist Sect, do you understand?
I understand.
I don't understand.
In that case, let's start now!
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
The little monk is here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
The disciples of the Taoist Sect are indeed as good as their reputation. This year, we will rely on {PlayerGivenName} to guard the demon.
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
The little monk is here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
{PlayerName}, you have indeed lived up to my expectations. Now you have to shoulder the responsibility of guarding that demon!
The demon is now imprisoned under the stone tower in the Ice Prison of Lin'an City Cloud Forest Temple. I will tell you how to enter the Ice Prison...
You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
I will definitely remember the teachings of the master.

Request for annual tribute.
Embark on a mission.
Go to Daliang City, negotiate this year's annual tribute situation with Qi Wang at Duke Ji's manor.
Inform Wan Yan Wuzhu of the results of the annual tribute negotiation.
The marshal has agreed to the negotiation results, you can now go to Qi Wang to fulfill his promise.

Previously, Wan Yan Liang went to the Zhao Kingdom to negotiate this year's annual tribute with Qi Wang, but the results were not satisfactory to me. I appoint you as the special envoy of Yan Kingdom to negotiate with Qi Wang, and you must give me a satisfactory answer!
Yes, sir!
Traitor {PlayerName}, you betray your country for glory, how dare you come here!
Today I am a special envoy of Yan Kingdom, here to discuss important matters with Qi Wang, it's best not to spoil the atmosphere.
Seeing you, the traitor, makes me angry. If you want to go in, beat us first!
The traitor is so arrogant, let's see how Qi Wang deals with you!
You should know who you're dealing with before you strike a dog. I won't take your life today, now get lost!
What brings you to my palace now that you've changed your allegiance?
What is your purpose for coming to my palace?
Today, I am here as a special envoy from the Yan Kingdom, specifically for the matter of the annual tribute.
Marshal Wan Yan is being a bit excessive, isn't he?\nJust a few days ago, an envoy was sent to negotiate this year's tribute. Why send someone again?
The Marshal said he was not satisfied with the results of your negotiations.
Do you take the agreement between the two countries as a joke?\nChanging orders from day to day, how can anyone trust you!

My purpose for this trip is to negotiate a satisfactory answer with Qi Wang. Otherwise, I won't give up. As for the rest, you can vent your dissatisfaction to the Marshal, it has nothing to do with me.
Talk? You'll have to survive first before you can negotiate with me.
{yell} Guards, seize this madman for me!
Your Highness Qi Wang, can we now have a calm and peaceful discussion?
Fine, you're tough, you call the shots.
I don't have much experience with matters like the annual tribute. I only know that the Marshal was not satisfied with the results of your previous negotiations, so you need to show some sincerity.

According to Marshal Wan Yan's initial demand for eight hundred thousand annual tributes, now the princes of various places are not willing to give a penny, and they are not willing to pay any taxes. I really can't afford such a huge annual tribute expense.
How much did you agree with Wan Yan Liang last time?
Half, four hundred thousand...
You're really good at bargaining, no wonder the Marshal is unhappy. This is like slapping him in the face.
This, this was requested by Wan Yan Liang. He promised that as long as I give him a unique martial arts book from my collection, he will guarantee to persuade Marshal Wan Yan to agree to this amount.
(So there's such a trick in it, how much annual tribute should I ask Qi Wang for?)
Eight hundred thousand annual tributes, not a penny less!
Seven hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
Six hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
Five hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
Since you are so pressing, let's see if you can get out of the palace alive!
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Eight hundred thousand annual tributes, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
Not only do I agree to these eight hundred thousand annual tributes, but I will also give you the unique martial arts book.
How can a talent like you be willing to serve under Wan Yan Wuzhu? I would be very happy to see the day when you overthrow him.
Since you are so pressing, let's see if you can get out of the palace alive!
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Seven hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
You are even more greedy than the previous person, wanting to have both the fish and the bear's paw. Let's see if you have the ability!
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Six hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
Although it's not much different from the previous negotiation results, why do you think you can get your hands on the manual of that unique martial arts?
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Five hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
Prince Qi Wang, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Qi Wang?\nIf it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
Prince Qi Wang, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Qi Wang?\nIf it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
Prince Qi Wang, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Qi Wang?\nIf it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
Inquire
Here comes another one, another one!
We are all people who have fallen into the world, it's fate that we meet today.
Humph, how boring!\nHow could I, the young master, be so foolish as to mingle with you guys.
What's going on?
Looking at you, you're probably planning to join the Shifa Temple too, why not go together, so we can look out for each other in the future.
Are all of you planning to join the Shifa Temple and become monks?
The Scripture Tower in Shifa Temple collects top-notch Manuals from all over the world, and the monks in the temple are all top-notch masters. I came here specifically to learn from them.
The flowers fall with intent, but the water flows heartlessly. My sincere heart has been shattered by the beauty, so I see through the world and come to Shifa Temple to become a monk.
A bunch of worldly people!

I am not like you, I am here to become a monk just for show, to become a nominal disciple of a master in the temple, to pray for my father for a hundred days, and then to return to the secular world to continue my adventurous life.
Young man, why don't you tell us why you want to become a monk?
Who said I want to become a monk?\nI just happened to pass by, I didn't think about becoming a monk.
I don't have time to listen to your idle talk, excuse me!
Pah, what a waste of time.
Young master, wait for me.
Before parting, I advise you, all beauties are skeletons, don't let the love of children and women wear away your heroism.
These guys are really weird.
May I ask what you need from this old monk?
Request information about Shifa Temple.
Inquire about Shifa Temple's Martial Arts.
Please enlighten me, master.
<color=#0574a8>Join Shifa Temple for cultivation.
Excuse me, Run away.

Shifa Temple has been established for hundreds of years, it was founded by a high monk from the east. Our temple has been passed down for more than thirty generations, during which many high monks have emerged, saving countless people, it is not an exaggeration to say that we have infinite merits.

The Martial Arts of our temple are vast and varied, and are rumored by the world to be magical. In the eyes of this old monk, Martial Arts are just a means for the Buddha's Vajra to protect the Dharma, to truly save all beings, we need the subtle Dharma and compassion.

Our Scripture Tower collects hundreds of thousands of archives of classics, history, and collections. As the saying goes, reading is beneficial. There was a peerless high monk in our temple who studied in the Scripture Tower for more than ten years, and finally stepped out of the tower, achieving the Buddha's golden body in one step!

Buddhism and Passives should not be lightly passed on, nor lightly taken. Only by becoming a disciple of Shifa Temple and gaining recognition can one have the chance to comprehend the subtle Dharma and receive profound Martial Arts.
Is there anything else you want to know, donor?

Our temple's martial arts are numerous and not worth mentioning, only the Vairocana Godly Palm is said to be directly passed down from the Buddha. If used by a person with a compassionate heart, every move carries the majesty of the Buddha himself!

Although the Dharma Stick Technique, which is on par with the Vairocana Godly Palm, is named after our ancestors by later generations, it does not disgrace the achievements and reputation of our predecessors in the Passive. It can at least rank in the top three among all stick techniques in the world.

The internal skills of our temple mainly focus on refining the mind and training the Constitution, all of which are Pure Yang Skills. They are not sufficient for attacking enemies, but more than enough for self-defense.
Is there anything else you want to know, donor?
Benefactor, you have a compassionate and benevolent heart. I am willing to lend you a helping hand.
Half a shichen later...
Buddha saves those who are destined. As long as you have good intentions, you can become a disciple of the Buddhist sect...
Benefactor, as you are currently a disciple of another sect, I cannot accept you on my own accord. Please forgive me.
Do you have any other matters, benefactor?
Your Benevolence is lacking, benefactor. You need to do more good deeds to accumulate Benevolence before you can hope to be accepted by the Shifa Temple.
Do you have any other matters, benefactor?
There are two ways to practice in Shifa Temple: <color=#c44b0e>becoming a monk</color> and <color=#c44b0e>lay practice</color>. Which one do you choose?
Request<color=#097a76>the difference</color> between <color=#097a76>becoming a monk</color> and <color=#097a76>lay practice</color>.
Choose<color=#097a76>to become a monk</color>!
Choose<color=#097a76>lay practice</color>!
I haven't decided yet.
Amitabha, practicing in the temple is not a child's play, you should indeed think it over carefully.

Becoming a monk means officially taking the vows and becoming a true monk of Shifa Temple. You need to abide by the rules and precepts, the most important of which is <color=#c44b0e>to cut off worldly attachments, practice alone in the temple, and not leave the temple without permission</color>.
Lay practice also requires you to uphold kindness and do good deeds, but you don't need to take the vows or abandon worldly life, and you are free to come and go without restrictions.
Monks of Shifa Temple can directly enter the Scripture Tower to comprehend the Dharma; lay practitioners need to pass a test to enter.

Although monks are strictly bound by the precepts, as long as they abide by them, they will benefit immensely. Lay practitioners are relatively free, but the conditions for obtaining profound Dharma and Martial Arts will be more stringent.
Have you decided how you want to practice in the temple, benefactor?
{PlayerSurName} Benefactor, can you abstain from alcohol for the rest of your life?
I can!
I can't.
Can you abstain from stealing for the rest of your life?
Can you abstain from lust for the rest of your life?
Can you abstain from killing for the rest of your life?
If someone tries to harm me, should I defend myself? Unintentional injuries or deaths may occur in a fight, does this count as breaking the precepts?
Enough talk, just answer yes or no!
{PlayerSurName} Benefactor, your six senses are not yet pure, it is indeed not suitable for you to become a monk now.
Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} benefactor, you should go and deal with worldly matters first, there's no rush to become a monk.
{PlayerName}, if you insist on becoming a monk, I will choose to run away, as if you never existed, and our friendship will be severed from then on!
Still insist on becoming a monk!
Give up becoming a monk.
{PlayerSurName} Benefactor, your six senses are not yet pure, it is indeed not suitable for you to become a monk now.
Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} benefactor, you should go and deal with worldly matters first, there's no rush to become a monk.
Good, good.\n{PlayerSurName}, you and I are destined, I will personally shave your head!
Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
A moment later...

{PlayerName}, the worldly affairs are now irrelevant to you.\nAccording to the order of Pu, Hui, Hua, and Shi, you are now in the Shi generation, and I give you the Dharma name <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color>, which means to give up your original name.
You can go to the Training field to request martial arts from your second senior brother Shi Yu; go to the Scripture Tower guarded by your master Hua Yan to read the Archive.
You must not leave the temple at will, if you want to leave the temple, you must pass my test.
<color=#c44b0e>Every day at Chen Shi, you must attend the morning class at the Hall of Great Strength, remember not to interrupt!</color>
As a disciple of Shifa Temple, you must not do anything against benevolence, otherwise, if discovered by the law enforcement disciples, you will be severely punished according to the temple rules!
Disciple will remember the abbot's teachings.

{PlayerName}, according to the order of Pu, Hui, Hua, and Shi, you are now in the Shi generation, and I give you the Dharma name <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color>, which means to give up your original name. From now on, all the same generation disciples in Shifa Temple are your senior brothers, and you must not lose your manners.

You can go to the Training field to request martial arts from your second senior brother Shi Yu; go to the Scripture Tower guarded by your master Hua Yan to read the Archive, but you need to pass his test.
You can choose whether to attend the morning class at the Hall of Great Strength every day, there is no requirement for secular disciples.

Although secular disciples do not have to be bound by too many precepts, it is the duty of Buddhist disciples to do good deeds, so do not do anything against heaven and reason, otherwise, you will be severely punished!
Disciple will remember the abbot's teachings.
Thank you, master, for your blessing.
Is there anything else you need, donor?
Amitabha!
As the saying goes, every cause has an effect! {PlayerSurName}, since you chose to run away from Buddhism, why bother trying again?
(She casually plucks the strings of the zither, the cold tune seems to tell you that if you insist on becoming a monk, she will run away from you, and your friendship with her will be severed.)
If you can't let go of worldly thoughts, it's better not to become a monk to avoid the trouble of returning to secular life later.
Kid, if you choose to become a monk, it will be like being in prison for a long time. You will have no connection with the outside world. Think it over!
Please stop, donor.\nThis is where the monks of our temple rest, it is not convenient for outsiders to enter, please understand.
Amitabha!
Donor, please stop!
This is a key area of our temple, non-disciples are not allowed to enter without permission!
Secular disciples of our sect are not allowed to enter the Scripture Tower without permission!
Entering the Scripture Tower as a secular disciple requires a deduction of 100 Sect contributions.
Enter (100 Sect contributions)
Wait a bit longer
Amitabha!
Amitabha!
Scripture Tower
Enter the tower
Secular disciples who want to enter the Scripture Tower need to read the "Temple Rules" and reach a Trust relationship with Shifa Temple.
Master Hua Yan, I want to request a way to enter the Scripture Tower.
When you <color=#c44b0e>finish reading the "Temple Rules" and reach a Trust relationship with our temple</color>, I will allow you to enter the Scripture Tower.

Lay disciples need to <color=#c44b0e>consume 100 points of Sect contribution</color> each time they enter the Scripture Tower. Therefore, if you want to visit the Scripture Tower frequently, you need to work diligently.
Thank you for the information, master.
You now meet the conditions to enter the Scripture Tower. You can enter the tower to read scriptures as long as you prepare the corresponding contributions each time.
After you <color=#c44b0e>have studied the "Temple rules" and your Relations with this temple reach Trust</color>, I will allow you to enter the Scripture Tower.
It seems that you can directly leap into the second or third floor of the Scripture Tower by using Qinggong from here!
Should I enter the Scripture Tower in this way? If the disciples in the tower find out, it won't be a joke.
Leap into the second floor of the Scripture Tower. <color=#097a76>Requires Qinggong 180</color>
Leap into the third floor of the Scripture Tower. <color=#097a76>Requires Qinggong 300</color>
I don't plan to try.
Oh no...
My skills are still not good enough.
Return to secular life
As a Buddhist disciple, how dare you talk about returning to secular life lightly?
If you return to secular life, it is equivalent to completely ruining the opportunity to seek truth and prove the fruit. The past merits will be lost in one day. Don't do foolish things!

Moreover, for a monk to return to secular life, he needs to go to the <color=#c44b0e>Arhat Hall</color> alone to break through the golden body bronze man array. This is a temple rule set a hundred years ago and cannot be compromised.
Amitabha, you have indeed broken through the bronze man array. It seems that your determination to return to secular life is quite firm. There is no need for me to retain you.
I am unable to focus on my Buddhist practices due to unresolved mundane matters, I hope the master can understand.
Amitabha, you are after all a person of the martial world, and the affairs of the martial world are the most difficult to resolve. I understand your predicament.
Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
{PlayerSurName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple, you can recover your original appearance.

Your hair has not yet fully grown back since you returned to secular life, and your appearance is slightly unseemly. I have a <color=#c44b0e>hair headgear</color> here, you can wear it to make up for it.
The master is always thoughtful.
Disciples of this temple who wish to return to secular life must pass through the Golden Body Bronze Man formation alone. If you are ready, you can challenge the formation at any time.
Challenge the formation!
I'll think about it.
Wait until you have the skill to pass through the Bronze Man formation, then consider returning to secular life.
You have passed the test of the Bronze Man Formation, now you can go to Abbot Hui Yuan to apply for secularization.
Those who practice should never give up halfway. Although you are a secular disciple, I can't bear to see your past achievements lost overnight.
Already decided! <color=#c44b0e>(Buddha prayer beads×1)</color>
I'll think about it.
To realize one's mistakes and correct them, there is no greater virtue.
Since you insist on this, it's not appropriate for this old monk to force you.\nEveryone has their own fate, all the events today are the result of karma.
{PlayerSurName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple.
Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
{PlayerName}, as a lay disciple of Shifa Temple, although you are not bound by the Defender's rules and precepts, you will still be punished for your wrongdoings!
May I ask, senior brother, what mistake have I made to deserve punishment?
Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
You are now full of malice, with no compassion in your eyes...
You are at odds with your fellow disciples, causing many disputes...
You harm your fellow disciples, showing no restraint...
You harm your fellow disciples, showing no regard for the bond between you!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>five times</color> as punishment!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>fifteen times</color> as punishment!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>thirty times</color> as punishment!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>fifty times</color> as punishment!
Accept the punishment.
Refuse to accept the punishment! <color=#097a76>(Start a fight directly)</color>
Amitabha, junior brother, please follow me.
{PlayerName}, you will stay here to copy the precepts. You can only run away when you finish.
For violating the temple rules and resisting punishment, the secular disciple will be caned fifty times and expelled from the temple!
{PlayerName}, are you really determined to sever ties with Shifa Temple so completely?
The world is so vast, I refuse to believe there's no place for me. I don't even take a mere Shifa Temple seriously.
{PlayerName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a secular disciple of Shifa Temple. Don't blame the temple for not reminiscing about the past with you. Take care of yourself!

You are no longer worthy of being a disciple of this temple, your secular disciple status is revoked from today!\nFrom now on, Shifa Temple will sever all ties with you, and there will be no more entanglements!
Hey, as a disciple of Shifa Temple, you must strictly observe the rules and precepts. Now that you have broken the precepts, you can't escape punishment!
May I ask, senior brother, what mistake have I made to deserve punishment?
Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
You are now full of malice, with no compassion in your eyes...
You are at odds with your fellow disciples, causing many disputes...
You harm your fellow disciples, showing no restraint...
You harm your fellow disciples, showing no regard for the bond between you!
Leaving the temple without permission!
As a monk, you are traveling with a woman, what a disgrace!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>five times</color> as punishment!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>fifteen times</color> as punishment!
Amitabha, junior brother, please follow me.
{PlayerName}, you will stay here to copy the precepts. You can only run away when you finish.
Violating the temple rules, resisting punishment, the monk will be punished with a hundred sticks and expelled from the temple!
{PlayerName}, are you really determined to sever ties with Shifa Temple so completely?
The world is so vast, I refuse to believe there's no place for me. I don't even take a mere Shifa Temple seriously.
{PlayerName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple. Don't blame the temple for not reminiscing about the past with you. Take care of yourself!
According to the rules of our sect, you will be punished with fifteen strokes of the cane and confined to the Repentance room, where you must copy <color=#c44b0e>thirty</color> Temple rules!
According to the rules of our sect, you will be punished with fifteen strokes of the cane and confined to the Repentance room, where you must copy <color=#c44b0e>fifty</color> Temple rules!
Amitabha, the caning punishment is over, junior brother, please follow me.
{PlayerName}, you will stay here to copy the precepts. You can only run away when you finish.
Violating the temple rules and resisting punishment, according to the temple rules, the monk will be punished with a hundred strokes of the cane and expelled from the temple!
{PlayerName}, are you really determined to sever ties with Shifa Temple so completely?
The world is so vast, I refuse to believe there's no place for me. I don't even take a mere Shifa Temple seriously.
{PlayerName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple. Don't blame the temple for not reminiscing about the past with you. Take care of yourself!
You have committed an unforgivable sin. To uphold the reputation of this temple, you must be punished with a hundred strokes of the cane and then expelled!
Amitabha, the punishment is over. From now on, you and this temple are severed. Take care of yourself.
Violating the temple rules and resisting punishment, according to the temple rules, the monk will be punished with a hundred strokes of the cane and expelled from the temple!
{PlayerName}, are you really determined to sever ties with Shifa Temple so completely?
The world is so vast, I refuse to believe there's no place for me. I don't even take a mere Shifa Temple seriously.
{PlayerName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a secular disciple of Shifa Temple. Don't blame the temple for not reminiscing about the past with you. Take care of yourself!
What should I do now?
Copy the Temple rules.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 6 shichen, 50 Stamina)</color>
Read Grade A Scripture.
Read Grade B Scripture.
Read Grade C Scripture.
Read Grade D Scripture.
Take a nap.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 3 shichen)</color>
Free activity.
After six shichen, you finally finished copying a set of Temple rules.
Brahman Immortals medical recipe, progress {TagNum:婆罗门诸仙药方进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Great Prajna Sutra, progress {TagNum:大般若经进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Vimalakirtinirdesa Sutra, progress {TagNum:维摩诘经进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Vairocana Solar Sutra (Sanskrit), progress {TagNum:大日如来经进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Do something else.
Free activity.
Two shichen later...
Finally finished reading the Brahman Immortals medical recipe, it was indeed very beneficial!
Let's pause here for now, I need a break...
Finally finished reading the Great Prajna Sutra, it was indeed very beneficial!
Finally finished reading the Vimalakirtinirdesa Sutra, it was indeed very beneficial!
A moment later
It's all in Sanskrit, I can't understand it at all, what a waste of time.
Unexpectedly, this Scripture hides a peerless internal strength method. It's really worth the time spent learning Sanskrit, I've found a treasure today.
Sanskrit dictionary, progress {TagNum:梵文解译进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Dragon Tree Buddha medical recipe, progress {TagNum:龙树菩萨养性方进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Lotus Sutra of Wondrous Dharma, progress {TagNum:妙法莲华经进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Lankavatara Sutra, progress {TagNum:楞伽经进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Do something else.
Free activity.
This Sanskrit dictionary is actually a book for learning Sanskrit! Now that I'm proficient in Sanskrit, I won't be at a loss when I encounter Scriptures written in Sanskrit.
Finally finished reading the Dragon Tree Buddha medical recipe, it was indeed very beneficial!
Finally finished reading the Lotus Sutra of Wondrous Dharma, it was indeed very beneficial!
Finally finished reading the Lankavatara Sutra, it was indeed very enlightening!

Lotus Sutra, progress {TagNum:法华经进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
