Finally finished reading the Buddhist Medical Scripture, it was indeed very enlightening!
Finally finished reading the Diamond Sutra, it was indeed very enlightening!
Finally finished reading the Lotus Sutra, it was indeed very enlightening!
Finally finished reading the Heart Sutra, it was indeed very enlightening!
Temple rules, progress {TagNum:释门戒律进度}%.<color=#097a76>(Consumes 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Do something else.
Free activity.
This Temple rules book, which talks about various rules of the Shifa Temple, has been read, but it seems that nothing has been learned...
Three shichen later...
Not enough written, need to keep working hard!
Should I call the discipline disciple to hand in the Temple rules (handwritten)?
Hand in Temple rules (handwritten)<color=#097a76>5 copies</color>
Hand in Temple rules (handwritten)<color=#097a76>15 copies</color>
Hand in Temple rules (handwritten)<color=#097a76>30 copies</color>
Hand in Temple rules (handwritten) <color=#097a76>50 copies</color>
Wait a bit longer
The punishment is over, you can run away now.\nAlthough writing the precepts can help you get rid of your anger and calm your mind, I don't want to bring you here for punishment again!
Since you converted to Buddhism, you have been reading scriptures in the Scripture Tower without any distractions.
No one knows how far your Buddhist cultivation has reached.
Until one day, the door of the Scripture Tower was slowly pushed open.
Everyone saw you sitting on the cushion with a solemn expression.
There seemed to be a faint glow, like pearls and gems, naturally shining.
Since then, it has been rumored among the people that Buddha has come to the world again in Shifa Temple...
Please stop, benefactor!
This place is not open to the public, please go back, benefactor.
Junior brother, stop!
Junior brother, you are not allowed to enter the Arhat Hall without permission.
Junior brother, to enter the Arhat Hall, you need to find the second senior brother to pass the Arhat formation and get permission to enter.
Junior brother, don't be careless when you first enter the Arhat Hall, the power of the Bronze Man formation is far superior to the Arhat formation.
Thank you for your advice, senior brother. I appreciate your kindness.
Read other Scriptures.
Get up and run away.

You have been studying the Buddhist scriptures for many years, and your understanding of Buddhism is increasing day by day.\nIn this way, you may become a respected monk in the future.\nDo you want to give up your dream of wandering the world and devote yourself to Buddhism?
Devote to Buddhism! (<color=#c44b0e>Ending of becoming a respected monk</color>)
Continue the dream of wandering the world.
This is, this is...
Lipo Lipo Di, Qiuhe Qiuhe Di, Tuoluoni Di, Nihe Luo Di, Pilini Di, Maha Jia Di, Zhen Ling Qian Di, Sopo He...
{yell}Seven Buddha Punishment Word!
I didn't expect that the real words of the Buddhist legend were hidden in a few Buddhist scriptures.
You really make me worry, don't expect me to bring you food and drink if you get locked up in such a broken place again.
I secretly roasted a chicken here when I was a monk. Can you still smell the lingering scent?
I know you don't have a habit of drinking, so I asked you to accompany me for a few drinks. So you won't be lonely, and I can have a quiet place to drink.
It's okay to make small mistakes, who hasn't been a regular here after staying in the temple for more than a decade?\nI picked a few radishes on the way here to change your taste.
If you can't copy it yourself, why don't you think of asking for help!\nYou're so stupid, you might as well kill yourself with this piece of Tofu.
Today is a rare leisure day, I came to see how embarrassed you are when you are punished to copy books.\nAlas, it's disappointing, you're still so lively, this medicine is taken for nothing.
Why were you punished this time, tell your senior brother, let me be happy.\nDon't be so stingy, at worst I'll give you a Novel to relieve your boredom, even though you can't read it.
An old lady pitied me for being too young and kindly gave me a few Chicken eggs. I brought a few, you can try to hatch them into chicks.
Considering the hard work of your senior brother, if one day I'm unlucky and get grounded, you have to bring things to see me, these are just stored here in advance.

Junior brother, you look a little pale, haven't you been resting well these days?\nI'm a prophet, I specially brought you a sleep aid, count it hundreds of times every day, I don't believe you won't be sleepy.
Eat it if you're hungry.
You are being punished here, but your martial arts must not be neglected.
If you dare to violate the temple rules again, I won't be soft on you!
Only this time, it won't happen again!
If you can't remember the precepts, read them a few more times!
You are not yet allowed to view this Scripture, please leave quickly!
{yell}Which thief dares to steal the scripture here!
If you dare to act like a rat in the scripture repository again, be careful of my fists and feet, they might hurt your life!
I dare not, I will never dare again.
Without the annoying guy, let me look carefully for any unique martial arts Manual.
Thanks to my fast running, otherwise I would have died here.
Huff... Huff...
(The Scriptures in this cabinet are in a mess, I don't know if there are any good things, do you want to search for them?)
Search the bookcase. <color=#097a76>(Consume 4 quarters)</color>
Not interested.
Half a shichen later...
This, this is the Prajna Palm Manual!!!
This, this is the Evil Destroyer Diamond Staff Manual!!!
"Little guy, there's good stuff hidden in this cabinet, you need to work hard~"\n"......Lai Toudian was here"
"Greedy little one, everything here has been taken, if you don't mind wasting time, feel free to continue"
Wasted time for nothing, didn't find anything useful.
Could it be this Manual that the junior brother is looking for?\nI've been engrossed in it these past few days and forgot to put it back in the bookcase, please forgive me.
Could it be this Manual that the junior brother is looking for?\nI've been engrossed in it these past few days and forgot to put it back in the bookcase, please forgive me.
Teaching
You can choose one of these two basic external skill Manuals to learn on your own.
Choose <color=#c44b0e>Arhat Fist Manual</color>.
Choose <color=#c44b0e>Veda Staff Manual</color>.
To learn the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Palm</color>, you must practice Arhat Fist to the eighth level at least!
This is the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Palm</color> Manual, cultivation depends on the individual, do not neglect your martial arts.
To learn the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten Staff</color>, you must practice Veda Staff to the eighth level at least!
This is the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten Staff</color> Manual, cultivation depends on the individual, do not neglect your martial arts.
Teaching

Shifa Temple's internal strength is known for its defense, which can offset some damage in battle.\nThis is the basic internal strength Manual of our temple, whether to learn or not depends on your personal Passive choice.
I have a second-class internal strength Manual called "Forging Golden Body", when your <color=#c44b0e>Buddhist comprehension reaches 70</color>, I will teach it to you.
Your current Buddhist comprehension is only <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, which does not meet my requirements.
Your Buddhist comprehension has now met my requirements, this "Forging Golden Body" internal strength Manual is now yours.
What a big bell hammer! But it's better not to touch it...
Morning Bell
Morning Bell
Responsible for ringing the Big bell at Mao Shi every day in Shifa Temple.\nHas rung the bell for {TagNum:释法寺敲钟} days.
Inform the eldest senior brother that the morning bell has been rung ten times.
Junior brother, according to the rules of our temple, newcomers must ring the morning bell ten times to truly become a part of Shifa Temple.
Starting from tomorrow, you will be responsible for the <color=#c44b0e>Mao Shi bell ringing</color> for the next few days.
Just ring the bell at Mao Shi every day, once a day, ring it for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color> to complete the task.
It's not Mao Shi yet, you can't ring the bell at will.
Do you want to start ringing the bell now? According to custom, it needs 108 times, which is a very exhausting task.
Start ringing the bell. (<color=#c44b0e>Consume 25 Stamina, 1 shichen</color>)
Not ready yet.
The bell rings 108 times, the sound gradually fades...
Finally completed the ten bell strikes, now I should be considered a true member of Shifa Temple.

Good job, good job. You've been ringing the bell for your senior brother for ten days, he should reward you well.\nHere's a copy of the "Heart Sutra" for you. As they say, reading is always beneficial. It's always good to read more scriptures in the temple.
Didn't you say that newcomers have to ring the bell ten times to officially join the Shifa Temple? Why do you say it's to help you ring the bell?

Would you be willing to help me ring the bell if I didn't say that? Who can get up so early in the morning? Anyway, there are so many junior brothers, if they take turns to help me ring it, we can get through the year.
Remember, you can only ring the bell at Mao Shi every day. It takes exactly one hundred and eight rings, which is very tiring. It's best to go after you've eaten.
Senior brother, I've finally finished ringing the bell ten times. I've done what I promised you...
I want to spar with the second senior brother. I hope you won't hesitate to teach me.
This time I'll spar with you using thirty percent of my strength. Be careful!
Go ahead! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10, protagonist duels alone</color>)
Not ready yet.
Normal, next time I'll use more strength in our match.
If you're lazy in your regular training, you won't have enough lives to lose when you really fight someone.
This time I'll spar with you using fifty percent of my strength. Be careful!
This time I'll spar with you using seventy percent of my strength. Be careful!
Your skills are now on par with mine. This time I'll respond with all my strength!
Let's stop here. You've already surpassed me. I don't have much to teach you anymore.

Let's stop here. You've already surpassed me. I don't have much to teach you anymore. With your talent, if you can comprehend the martial arts in this manual, you will surely become even stronger, with unlimited potential.
Senior brother, you're talking a lot today. Aren't you usually very reserved?

You're progressing rapidly in martial arts, and I'm far behind. I won't have many opportunities to guide you in your training in the future, and even fewer chances to talk to you. So I might as well say a few more words today.
Hehe, if senior brother feels lonely, junior brother is always willing to keep you company.
Go away, stop making noise. Who needs your company!
Practice
Don't rush when practicing. Now build a solid foundation on the wooden dummy, so you won't be restrained when you're in a real fight.
How many wooden dummies are you planning to challenge this time?
Challenge 1! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
Challenge 3! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
Challenge 5! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
Challenge 10! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
Not ready yet.
Defeating one ordinary wooden dummy is nothing to brag about.
If you can't even defeat a wooden dummy, will you still be alive when you meet a real person!
Defeating a few ordinary wooden dummies is nothing to brag about.
Defeating a few wooden dummies is nothing to brag about.
These wooden dummies really need to be repaired. They can't even defeat a novice junior brother.
Break through the formation
You must break through my Arhat formation alone to qualify to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Golden Body Bronze Man formation!
Are you planning to challenge the Arhat Formation?
Prepare to challenge the Arhat Formation! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 20</color>)
Not ready yet.

Breaking the formation is expected, there's nothing to be proud of.\nThe Golden Body Bronze Man Formation of Shifa Temple is the foundation of the temple, its Power is extraordinary, don't be complacent.
Hmph, you're not qualified to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Golden Body Bronze Man Formation yet!
Kitchen Helper
Many new disciples have recently joined the temple, and the Kitchen is a bit overwhelmed.\nI wonder if there's any kind-hearted junior brother willing to lend a hand.
The Kitchen is running out of firewood, could you help me get <color=#c44b0e>20 Branches</color> for cooking?
There are plenty of trees to cut down in the forest behind the temple, they will Recovery over time, so don't worry if you can't find Branches for a while.
Help Third Brother with his tasks.
Maybe another day.
Third Brother, here are the Branches you asked for.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Did you forget what you were supposed to do?
I want to do something different.
I don't want to help today.
Understood.
Let me see what else needs to be done...
Alright, I'll do it myself today.
We're running out of Mushrooms and Fungus for the vegetarian dishes, could you help me gather <color=#c44b0e>5 Fungus and 5 Mushrooms</color>?
There are plenty of Mushrooms around the Pond and Forest Tower, and Fungus often grows on tree trunks. These two items will grow back over time, so don't worry about running out.
Third Brother, here are the Mushrooms and Fungus you asked for.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Today we need to make hundreds of Steamed Buns, which will take a lot of effort and time,
Help Third Brother with his tasks. (<color=#c44b0e>Consumes 1 shichen, requires Stamina 25</color>)
Help Third Brother with his tasks. (<color=#c44b0e>Consumes 2 shichen, requires Stamina 50</color>)
Maybe another day.
One shichen later...
I didn't expect your cooking skills to be so good, with your help we finished making the Steamed Buns in half the time.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Two shichen later...
Phew, finally done...
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
It would be great if you could help in the kitchen tomorrow as well.
Today I'll teach you some cooking skills, so you won't starve when you're out in the world.
Hehe, helping you in the kitchen will be easier in the future.
I should give you something in return. This cookbook is my masterpiece from when I was young, I'll give it to you today.
Why don't you make me a dish to taste instead?
There are dozens of people who have booked ahead of you, and I can only make one dish a day at most, so wait if you can.
I could make it myself in this time, who cares about your cooking.

Little junior brother, no matter what happens in the future, we've Known each other, and that's fate.\nThis cookbook of mine is as famous as the Vairocana Godly Palm of our temple in the martial arts world, I'll give it to you today as a keepsake.
Are you planning to settle your affairs?\nI'll gladly accept any other good things you have.
Being too familiar with you is not good, you're taking advantage of me, it's really funny.
Remember to be good to your senior brother, maybe one day he will need your help, don't forget to show some kindness.
Your senior brother's business is my business, no doubt about it!
Remember your promise, it's worth our brotherhood.

Defeat <#61C3C8>all enemies</color>
<#61C3C8>{PlayerName}</color> is defeated
Three Sects Demon Suppression
Demon Suppression
Go to Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple, find Zhong Yangzi and Cai Yuanchang respectively, invite the successors of the two sects to meet at Shifa Temple.
Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple have agreed to the appointment, now return to Shifa Temple and report to Hui Yuan.
More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.

This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
The heads of the three sects joined forces, set up several times, after many twists and turns, paid a heavy price to capture him seriously injured.

This man not only knows the long-lost sect manuals of the three sects, but also is the only person in the world who knows the whereabouts of the {Imperial Seal}, so he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, not killed.
Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.

There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.

During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?

Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
Risks and opportunities coexist...

Shiming, I want you to represent Shifa Temple, invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition, to decide who will guard this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your own fortune.
Yes, I will definitely bring honor to Shifa Temple and let the world know that Shifa Temple always stands at the top of the three sects!
I already know why you're here, but in the past, it was always Lai Toudian from Shifa Temple who came. Today, they sent you, a young boy, how capable can you be to take on this task?

If you can take my move, Confucius Temple will naturally send someone to Shifa Temple; otherwise, please ask Shifa Temple to choose another successor, don't treat this important task as a child's play!
You, as a senior leader of a sect, taking action against a junior, isn't that demeaning yourself?
This is not a child's play, how can such a weak person guard the demon, go back and tell Hui Yuan, ask him to choose someone else.
Young man, do you really want to be so stubborn? The old man wants to see how many times you will fall before you give up!
You barely have some skills, since you have passed the old man's test, the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment.

I didn't expect Hui Yuan to send you to participate in the competition of the successors of the three sects this time, he must be very confident. Considering our past relationship, I won't make things difficult for you, go back and tell Hui Yuan, Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend on time.
Please tell Hui Yuan that Taoist Sect will send the successor to attend on time.
That was easy? A bit unexpected.\nAren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Shifa Temple?
I believe Hui Yuan wouldn't treat this important task lightly, he must have his reasons for sending you here, I don't need to worry about it.
{PlayerGivenName} junior brother, I have been waiting here on behalf of the Confucius Temple.
{PlayerSurName} brother, I have been waiting here for a long time.
I am Cai Youzhi, representing the Confucius Temple, and I have been waiting here for a long time.
{PlayerSurName} senior brother, I'm here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
You're slower than a turtle, if I had known, I would have taken a nap first.
I'm La Tazhang, here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin.\n{PlayerName} You're new here, you don't understand the rules, let me explain them to you.

{PlayerName} You represent Shifa Temple, as the host, you need to go through three rounds of competition, the first round you and Taoist Sect against Confucius Temple; the second round you and Confucius Temple against Taoist Sect; the third round you alone against the two sects.
If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon this year; if you lose any round, this matter will have nothing to do with Shifa Temple, do you understand?
I understand.
I don't understand.
In that case, let's start now!
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
I'm here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
The disciples of Shifa Temple are indeed well-deserved, this year we will have to trouble {PlayerGivenName} junior brother to guard the demon.
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
Stop dawdling, let's get started.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
Stop dawdling, let's get started.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
I'm here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
{PlayerName}, you really didn't let me down, now you have to take on the responsibility of guarding that demon!
The demon is currently imprisoned in the <color=#c44b0e>Ice Prison under the stone tower of Lin'an CityCloud Forest Temple</color>. I will tell you the method to enter the Ice Prison...
You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.

Take care of yourself, young man~
Kid, I lost one of my straw sandals. Go find it for me.

Pick it up or not, it's up to me whether you can pass here.
It seems that the shoe was lost near this <color=#c44b0e>bridge</color>. You can find it yourself. If someone else picks up my straw sandal, you won't be able to cross the bridge.
Where's my straw sandal? If you can't find it, don't think about passing here.
Hmm, hmm, this is the smell, it seems you have found my straw sandal.
Can I pass now?
I just lost another straw sandal, go find it again.
I just picked up one, how did you lose another one?
People have two feet, what's so strange about losing two sandals? Hurry up and go! The <color=#c44b0e>Baoguo Temple</color> is crowded, they shouldn't step on my sandal.
Finally, my precious straw sandal is back, it's really killing me.
You can get intimate with your straw sandal after I leave, let me cross the bridge now.
What a pity, what a pity, my straw sandals are so unfortunate, they can never be reunited. One comes back, the other is lost again. I have to trouble you to find it again.
You're deliberately messing with me, who has the time to find your tattered shoes!
Oh dear, ever since the old man wandered in front of <color=#c44b0e>Duke Ji's manor</color>, his feet have been cold. I don't know when he lost it.
They say practice makes perfect, your eye for details can't escape the old man's straw shoes.
Please spare me, if I do this boring thing again, I will collapse.
Oh dear, another shoe is missing, what should I do?
The mountain is nine ren high, but the work is one basket short. If it weren't for being chased by a mad dog at the door of the <color=#c44b0e>inn</color>, this shoe wouldn't have been lost.
Hey, where are you going?
I've delivered the straw shoes to you, I won't cross this bridge, if you lose your shoes again, go find someone else.
Even though you are unwilling, you still picked up shoes for the old man four times, how can the old man continue to trouble you with such sincerity.
This little thing is a thank you gift for helping the old man pick up shoes.
And this jade bamboo, I'll give it to you too, this thing should be a bit useful.
So it's the "Propriety" inscripted jade bamboo, it's actually on you?
In ancient times, Zhang Liang gave shoes, now the young man picks up straw shoes, wonderful, wonderful.
The old man doesn't have any straw shoes for you to pick up now, your dragon-slaying technique is useless here.
Can the old man request to know the news of the inscripted jade bamboo?
The old man has been waiting for you to come and get it, if you come a little later, the old man will throw it out like a lost straw shoe, and you will have to turn over Daliang City to find it.
The old man can finally go home and rest.
(Pointed to a piece of paper in front of him)
"Solve five riddles, enjoy free food"
Are you ready to solve the riddles now?
Start answering.

(Waved his hand, let him come another day)
(Shook his head, indicating that he couldn't guess the riddle today)
(Nodded slightly, handed over a delicate snack)
(Handed you something else)
This is...
May I ask if the old woman knows the whereabouts of the jade bamboo?
(Looked at you with a meaningful look, then handed out an object)
This is...
Brother, I have an urgent matter to run away, can you help me look after the business?
Agree to help.
Not convenient for now.
No problem helping, but how should I look after the business?
It's simple, you just need to remember the prices of these fruits, and when customers come to buy, sell them at the prices I told you.
If you get the price wrong and sell at a loss, you have to pay me; if you sell high, beware of customers making trouble and smashing the stall!
Don't worry, just tell me the prices of these fruits.
You must remember!
Apples are 9 wen per catty...
Lychees are 24 wen per catty...
Sweet melons are 50 wen per catty...
Did you remember all that?
I remembered!
I didn't remember.
I'll leave this stall to you, I'll be back in a while.
Don't worry, I definitely won't smash your sign.
Give me <color=#c44b0e>five catties of apples</color>, calculate how much it costs.
45 wen.
54 wen (small price increase).
72 wen (large price increase).
The money is well received, if it's delicious, come back to buy next time.
A moment later...
Shopkeeper, how do you sell these lychees?
24 copper coins per catty
30 copper coins per catty (slight price increase)
40 copper coins per catty (significant price increase)
It's so cheap, give me ten catties.
Well, the expensive ones must be tastier than the cheap ones. Let's start with ten catties.
The lychees this year are much more expensive than before, almost unaffordable.\nLet's start with a little, give me ten catties, just to taste it.
A moment later...
Brother, how much is this melon per catty?
50 copper coins per catty
100 copper coins per catty (significant price increase)
200 copper coins per catty (huge price increase)
Others sell for 50 copper coins per catty, you also sell for 50 copper coins per catty, what's different about your melon?
There's no difference, I'm just a stall keeper. The price is set by the stall owner, not a penny more or less.
Anyway, buying from anyone is the same, I'll buy twenty catties from you!
Brother, can this melon cure all diseases when eaten?
No.
Can it prolong life?
I haven't tried.
So what's the use of eating this melon?
Quench thirst, fill stomach.
I'll try your 100 copper coins per catty melon to see what's different from others. Give me twenty catties, I'll improve my meal today and have a full melon feast.
Is the skin of your melon made of gold, or are the melon seeds made of gold?
Look around, where can you find melons now? Nowadays everything is expensive due to the chaos. If you think it's expensive, I think it's expensive too.
Alright, pick one for me.
Okay~

How about this one, it's big and fat?

Twenty catties, a total of 4000 copper coins, thank you for your patronage.
4000 copper coins for a melon, are you robbing me!

Brothers, smash his stall for me!

Demon Suppression
Go to Taoist Sect and Shifa Temple, find Zhong Yangzi and Hui Yuan, invite the successors of the two sects to gather at Confucius Temple.
Shifa Temple and Taoist Sect have agreed to the invitation, now return to Confucius Temple and report to Cai Yuanchang.
More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.

This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
The heads of the three sects joined forces, set up several times, after many twists and turns, paid a heavy price to capture him seriously injured.

This man not only knows the long-lost sect manuals of the three sects, but also is the only person in the world who knows the whereabouts of the {Imperial Seal}, so he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, not killed.
Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.

There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.

During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?

Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
Risks and opportunities coexist...

{PlayerName}, as the representative of Confucius Temple, you are to invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition to determine who will guard this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your own fortune.
Yes, I will not disgrace the name of Confucius Temple!
Please inform Master Cai that Shifa Temple will send a successor to attend the meeting on time.

If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon this year. If you lose any round, Confucius Temple will have nothing to do with this matter. Do you understand?
